sections.title: Tattooed Mystic (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Tattooed Mystic class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Tattooed Mystic)
sections.description: Tattooed mystics gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Familiar Tattoo (Su) (Tattooed Mystic)
sections.description: Functions identically to the tattooed sorcerer's familiar tattoo ability, allowing the familiar to become a tattoo on the mystic's skin.

sections.title: Mystic Tattoo (Su) (Tattooed Mystic)
sections.description: The mystic inscribes magical tattoos that enhance spellcasting, gaining one every two levels starting at 2nd level from a list of seven options.

sections.title: Magical Tattoo Artist (Tattooed Mystic)
sections.description: At 3rd level, the tattooed mystic gains Inscribe Magical Tattoo as a bonus feat.

sections.title: Skillful Tattooist ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Tattooed Mystic)
sections.description: At 5th level, the mystic can craft magical tattoos on his own body in half the normal time using Craft skills.

sections.title: Tattoo Mastery ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Tattooed Mystic)
sections.description: At 7th level, the mystic can use his own ability score modifiers, feats, and caster level when crafting spell tattoos, similar to using a staff.

sections.title: Potent Tattoos ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Tattooed Mystic)
sections.description: At 9th level, spell tattoos crafted by the mystic use his caster level +1 when determining their save DCs.
